response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. Given its significance to you, I understand its worth is $1,500,000. After careful consideration and evaluation, I propose to sell this unique item to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between the product's intrinsic value and my objective to ensure a fair transaction. I am confident that this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to achieve our respective goals. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
